name: SAT
description:
The creator, gave you birth and asked you to fulfill a challenge. You'll need to defeat your others relatives. Will you succeed ?

You will have to dodge and collect their bullets with your sattelite. Such maneuver will give you a lot of power, the ability to harm gods. But take care, they will manage their weapons and try to defeat you !

This game concept was created when the GMTK 2021 occured. With my current master's degree and stuff I couldn't work fastly on it but here it is ! I want to move on this project, but if enough people love it, Ill finish it. 

If you first try every boss you'll finish in like 20 minutes.

-------- Commands --------

Move : Arrow keys

Expand the orbit : space

Action (speak, confirm...) : Return

Cancel : escape
